name: Super Fluffy Adventure
description:
In this peaceful little adventure, you will accompany the little bunny Fluffy, oh his journey to find his Beloved cake.

Control:

You can easily control Fluffy with the arrow keys :)

Watch how this game was created :D


  I whish you a restful journey and a lot of fun <3

 

This game was created for the #CommunityGameJam
